description: The Canadian Transportation Agency is responsible for ensuring that undue barriers to the mobility of persons with disabilities are eliminated within the national transportation system. This RFID seeks to purchase a) simultaneous interpretation services available for upcoming Zoom meetings/events, b) consolidate resources for conducting virtual meetings and c) standardize the level and quality of services offered during virtual meetings.
full_summary:
# Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Simultaneous Interpretation Services
## Document Summary
A standing offer request for dual-language simultaneous interpretation services was made to support Canadian Transportation Agency meetings and events.

### Details
* **Reference Number:** PW-22-01016247 (Amendment 3)
* **Solicitation Number:** D312023003
* **Publication Date:** December 7, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date (Expired):** January 16, 2023, 1:00 PM EST
* **Contracting Entity:** Canadian Transportation Agency (15 rue Eddy, Gatineau, Quebec, J8X4B3, Canada)
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity and Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

### Objective
The Canadian Transportation Agency seeks simultaneous interpretation services to support its remote meetings and events. This service will ensure equal access for people with disabilities and provide a barrier-free and accessible communication environment.

### Contract Details
* **Duration:** Contract awarded date to March 31, 2027
* **Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Purchase Type:** Standing Offer
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

### Key Documents
* Request for Standing Offers (RFSO)
* Amendment No. 1 - RFOS Certifications
* Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) 2
* Questions and Answers

### Further Information
For further information and to view the key documents, please visit the following website: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/07/f1ccf2ab2feb24acc50191298f5216b6/request_for_standing_offers_rfso.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/07/f1ccf2ab2feb24acc50191298f5216b6/request_for_standing_offers_rfso.pdf).

### Contacts
* Nancy Trepanier
* E-mail: nancy.trepanier@cta-otc.gc.ca
* Phone: 873-455-5986
